rules_text:
Changeling [i](This card is every creature type.)[/i]
Deception {2}{W} [i]({2}{W}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you may search your library for a creature card with toughness 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
